website_summaries.verdict: This apartment-friendly grill is also the tailgate king, hosting ample grilling surface to feed large groups of people.
pros: of space allows you to cook a whopping 15-plus servings at a time, making it not only perfect for indoor events but outdoors, too
Adjustable temperature control gives you 5 heat options for cooking any kind of food
cons: Although it’s dishwasher safe, some find the grill’s parts tedious to clean, and you’ll need to wipe the lid by hand in the sink
Unit is also top-heavy, making it awkward to carry around

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect grill for apartment balcony
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect grill for apartment balcony. It was easy to clean and it's really non-stick. In comparison to other brands, this actually heat up the plate instead of heating lights. It cooked really well and was very easy to install. I would definitely recommend to purchase this if you have a small balcony.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk won't clean up after using a few months
customer_reviews.text: This piece of junk! I'm so aggravated with this. When it gets a little older it sticks terribly. I tried all the recommendations on how to clean it, total garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Cool S

customer_reviews.title: Chipped during first use :(
customer_reviews.text: The assembly was easy, the temperature controls was great. The steak came out wonderful and it was easy to clean. While cleaning the grill after the first use, I noticed the non-stick coating is chipping off. This is so disappointing. I hope it is a fluke and the manufacturer will replace the grill plate, but until then I’ll have to give this grill 1 star for lack if quality, durability, and value.
customer_reviews.author: JoCo JCF

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: This grill is the best. Great for cooking and thought my food wouldn’t look as good on it, but was wrong. The assembly instructions aren’t the best. When you put the stand together, press really hard to connect the two poles.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Whitmoyer

customer_reviews.title: Clumsy to use - need a table for the lid
customer_reviews.text: The handle to the lib is held on by a screw on knob with a rubber bushing on it. When the lid is on, the rubber bushing is over the hot grill with your food on it. So you cook the rubber along with your food. This knob is supposed to work as a hanger for the lid except when you do that, half of the grill is covered by the lid - and the rubber bushing goes right on the hot grill. The bottom half of the unit is plastic which holds the hot grill.
customer_reviews.author: aj

customer_reviews.title: I want a Refund Please
customer_reviews.text: Since we have no choice but to use an electric grill at our new condo, I DI a fair amount of research on grills. This grill is inexp and much larger than I anticipated. Also, I’ve had no trouble at all keeping the grill hot. I’m very pleased! Update - It's been about 6 weeks and the grill stopped working. There were a couple reviews I saw that this also happened to a few others. I'm extremely disappointed as this would have been the perfect size for our patio.
customer_reviews.author: Cyclonerex

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised. If in doubt, just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant about buying an electric grill for my deck. However, I don’t like the idea of eating gas or dealing with propane tanks so I figured what did I have to lose for 89.00? Well, I’m amazed. This thing can cook. And clean up is a breeze. It’s heats up nicely. 15 servings? Not unless they are all hot dogs. This would fit six large steaks or burgers adequately. I’m happy. Oh, there is one tiny little scratch on the non stick surface but not an issue enough to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Oku

customer_reviews.title: the worst grill ever
customer_reviews.text: the worst grill ever, I bought it since I was moving to a new place where is not aloud to use charcoal or propane grills, to bad that the return window is closed, takes for ever to get the grill hot, cable get really hot, well I guess I trow away my money with this s...tty grill.
customer_reviews.author: THE ONE

customer_reviews.title: Review not for the kind hearted.
customer_reviews.text: We live in an apartment complex that is ran like the department of corrections. No Barbeques, no smoking on the property, no skate boards or bikes, no drinking, no loud noises, no farting cross winds, but evidently junkies littering the place with needles is acceptable. This George Foreman is most definitely a spite buy and love it. I can grill bacon on it at weird hours and grill up somw mean BBQ chicken and burgers just because F**k them thats why.
customer_reviews.author: Mr&Mrs. Sinner

customer_reviews.title: Knock off no george foreman logo on it
customer_reviews.text: Not sure this is a real George foreman put it together an as you can see nowhere on it does it say George Foreman that's really crappy to send me a knock off I had to get together today needed to grill today and have to use my other Grill very unhappy was excited to use this girl for my get together just now I'm unhappy not the real thing
customer_reviews.author: trisha quintana

customer_reviews.title: 3 YR Warranty! Easy clean-up/plug needed replacing aafter few uses.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent grill. Easy to clean!!!!! Lightweight for moving. Plug stopped working 4/2017 GOOD NEWS - ***3 year warranty!! Call 1-800-231-9786 for great help and plug replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Alice J C

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 use
customer_reviews.text: We used the grill once then tried to use it again 2 weeks later and it didn’t work. We tried it with different outlets in our home to verify and still could not get it to work. We were very disappointed because we loved our countertop foreman grill that we have had for years! However, this one was a bust.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay... I was a little worried on this purchase but loved the low price. I am not wanting propane at this time in my small space and apartment complex... I was thinking to make things easier for me!!! Less stress ya know? SO, I just want to say I am crazy obsessed with this already... it gets HOT- I made burgers with bacon on the grill today for the first time and I had to lower the temp so I wouldn’t burn my burgers! The bacon cooked FAST!! Level 5 I’m not sure what that’s for because wow.... I lowered it from 5... then to 1 just to let it cook. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Author Shelbi Mattison

customer_reviews.title: Great grill, but already broke the handle
customer_reviews.text: My first GFG lasted 15 years, dying last week. Replacement looks identical, works just fine, but seems to have a bit lower power. Don't quote me on this. Unfortunately, the lid slipped off the base catch three times breaking the handle. Now use it in reverse which works but 15 years and my other lid never slipped off. Went to buy another handle but it was 1/3rd the price of a new gill so I balked. Still a great indoor grill, especially for breakfast steaks, grilled fish, burgers etc.
customer_reviews.author: ATP1

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: My rating is for customer service. BBQ fell over in the wind within 2 weeks of ownership and broke the base. Asked them to replace it. They refused. You think a little goodwill might be in order. As a BBQ, it gets the job done. Needs more heating elements to wrap the griddle so not so many low heat areas. Very flimsy. Base spins around, should have a cotter pin to secure. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: John K

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING AFTER WARRANTY EXPIRED
customer_reviews.text: THIS GRILL was great until it stopped working. we had it less than a year and it fried out and no longer turns on. I will happily change my review if the company makes this right thanks!
customer_reviews.author: max wojcik

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I recently moved from a rental house to a rental apartment while he finishes up his contract at work. He was depressed about having to give up grilling. I bought this for him for Father's Day, and he's super happy with it. He cooked bacon on it first, and it turned out great. Then he cooked thick burgers on it, and those turned out great too! Great indoor grill. Super easy to put together and clean as well. Super happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for Condo Living
customer_reviews.text: We have a small area behind our condo and, unfortunately, we are unable to own a gas grill BUT we've been using the George Foreman electric grill for the last few years and it's been a great consolation! Remember to let it heat for about five minutes before grilling and listen to the sizzle when the food first goes on. My only quibble is it's a bit burdensome to clean. We have a small, deep kitchen sink and it's a little bit of a pain to hold while cleaning. But this does not take away from a very capable grill. Invest in a few sponges made to clean this type of grill. Highly recommended grill!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Meowzers

customer_reviews.title: Great Apartment Grill
customer_reviews.text: This grill heats up very quickly and stays hot. I'm not so good at regulating temperature but need to practice that more, i.e. opening and closing vent. Food cooked was very, very tender, which surprised me. Of course as with most electrical grills, it cannot deliver that delicious charcoal flavor that a regular charcoal heated grill does but still good food. This is a good grill for anyone living in an apartment. I use a non-stick copper cook mat on grill and place food on top of that so cleanup is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie S.

customer_reviews.title: Great grill!  Easy to use and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always used charcoal or gas grills, and bought this for my daughter to use at her college apartment. Because of COVID she has been at our house so we’ve now used it five times to try it out. I was skeptical of it based on the name, but have to say it is a great grill. Steaks, burgers, brats, all turned out great. Heats quickly and evenly. Nice sear on the meat. Full range of temperature. It’s built well, and assembly has nothing to it. The cooking grill is truly non-stick, easy to remove and cleans up fast. Great price and even better grill.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Grill!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband because we were moving into a new apartment that didn't allow grills. He was upset he couldn't grill but I found this and surprised him with it. We just tried it out yesterday on steaks of all things and it was AMAZING! The steak tasted great and he really enjoyed the simplicity of not only putting it together but also the grilling! Would highly recommend for anyone who is moving into an apartment or wants a heck of an indoor grill.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my bbq grill
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected, a very good bbq grill. Good quality, we enjoy it almost every day. Super easy to clean and very easy to assemble. A great product.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this grill for mothers day. I can't say enough good things about it! I love it! It heats up so quick and the meat is so juicy. Corn was so sweet! Food was so delicious. I did had to use non stick cooking spray some meat did get stuck on the grill but otherwise it was worth every penny!❤❤❤
customer_reviews.author: angelica

customer_reviews.title: Never Using a Gas Grill Again!!
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a gas grill snob. I moved to an apartment and gas grills aren't allowed so decided to give this a try. I love it! My food has turned out perfectly cooked and steaks, chicken, and pork tenderloin medallions have all turned out juicier than on a gas grill! Veggies grill perfectly with no burned spots. I'm officially a convert! Plus, super easy to keep clean!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Dunn

customer_reviews.title: I love this grill but...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic grill but the setup instructions and temperature gauge are poor. Dial goes from 1-5 and the directions don't indicate what the actual heat is for each setting. Also it would be better if there was some way they could have had a place for cooking utensils. Other than that this thing is awesome! Update*** after a few months it's cooking very unevenly, mostly only on the side where the connection is, grabage now.
customer_reviews.author: Pacu

customer_reviews.title: More of a portable and outdoor griddle
customer_reviews.text: This "grill" is great for small spaces outdoors. It gives a great "grill" feel and keeps all the grease in one tray. Super easy to use, healthy and convenient when you don't want certain foods smelling the home. I like to advise that this is more of a hot griddle than a grill. It's electric so you are not getting the grill taste or smell BUT you do get even cooking with grill marks! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Great grill - wrong top
customer_reviews.text: Grill arrived earlier today on time as promised and undamaged. It was easy to assemble, doesn't take up a lot of space, followed prep directions and cooked a couple of steaks and sweet onions. Great experience!! Clean up was a snap and I couldn't be happier. One things I wish to mention is that I did not receive the grill cover with the same on it as pictured. Mine has another name on it which looks like Gary something or other. I would like to receive the same one pictured online as it might fit better. Please help. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Nellie

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for Condo Living!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a condo with a large private balcony on the building's back side. This grill is large enough for 4-6 steaks, chicken breasts, etc. without the fire hazard of propane/charcoal since it's electric. The cooking grate/grill is removeable and can also be used (with a strong exhaust fan) on a granite counter inside. When I'm done cooking, I let it cool then soak in a laundry tub for about 15 minutes. After a light rub down with a Scrub Daddy it's spotless and ready to use again. I do recommend buying a cover for it (not included). BTW also recommend that you grill lean meats so that you don't smoke out the neighbors and generate complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Lee K.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: i like this well enough. i would change two things though. make a better way to hang the lid on the side. put a hook below the grill. the other thing is, slant the raised grill bar towards the grease tray and slant the entire grill a tiny bit towards the grease tray. i spend a lot of time just pushing grease towards the drip tray.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hickman

customer_reviews.title: small in size but grills perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews and agree it gets really hot while cooking, so use good heat resistant gloves. It does require cleaning but that is not a problem; you need a large tub or sink. I am 77yrs old, never grilled, relied on my spouse to do the grilling. I bought this grill and made both pork and steak according to the directions both turned out perfectly-medium rare. DO keep children away the unit, plug become very hot during cooking.
customer_reviews.author: E. sl

customer_reviews.title: Makes grilled food, no matter who uses it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to supplement the cooking skills of my ex-wife while I was still living in the house. While she still uses the smoke detector as a cooking timer, the food tastes much better out of this grill. We've used it only on the stand, it looks like you can use it without the stand, but I haven't tried it. The setup is easy and the operation is simple enough, the only downside is the cleaning of it, but it is easier to clean this than a regular grill.
customer_reviews.author: I'm trek'd

customer_reviews.title: First time making Seekh kebaabs....
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time making seekh kebabs and using the grill as well. Very impressed with the outcome. The grill gets hot immediately. We needed something which could fit in our balcony without consuming a lot of space. Since we live in a high rise bldg and also have a 2 yr old baby, we wanted it without fire or burning charcoal etc. This is perfect size. Also it cool down very fast once truned off. Will try more dishes in future after learning from Youtube. :))
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best grill ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the second grill purchased. The cord failed on the first one we had. We had it for about 2 years and used at least 3 times per week. This one has the removable grill which will make it easier to clean. I can’t say enough about how grea this grill is. We used to barbecue with gas but everything was either burnt or uncooked. I have never had a problem with that issue with this. Everything is cooked perfectly and never dry. I recommend highly
customer_reviews.author: Judi Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Apartment dweller disappointed after having high hopes
customer_reviews.text: Pros: even heating over entire heating surface. Compact for small spaces. Can even be used indoors. Cons: Seemingly “convenient” storage position for lid seems convenient, but any grease spatter from inside hood surface drips right onto deck or patio. Inconvenient to clean surface, since charred fat doesn’t always drain away to drain channel and into drain pan below. Sorry Joe Foreman! 😞 Thought this might be a good substitute for the electric CharBroil Bistro - but nope! Going back to an electric grill with traditional lid and side shelf platforms. Much easier to clean, scrape after each use, and just tip up the lid.
customer_reviews.author: TrainerCoach

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I almost got rid of my gas grill after using this. It's true, you may not get that "charcoal or flame broiled" taste when using this, but it cooks evenly, and leaves great sear lines on all foods. Best part is, it is super easy to clean, I put a little bit of water on a napkin and wipe it down while it is still warm, just like new after dozens of uses. Only downside is, if you live somewhere that gets reasonably strong winds on a regular basis, it can easily be blown over, it is not a very heavy item and the supports are lightweight plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Dadelous

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment and keep this on my terrace. It works great and it really easy to clean. My only issue is that the cover gets really dirty and the round piece that goes over the top of the cover does not fit in properly, but I don't really need it. It was super easy to assemble and the grill is very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: It seems to lose its heat quickly once you place the meat on the grill and never reach the initial high temps again. The first side of the steaks seem to cook better than the other side. The taste is nothing like a coal grilled meat but you should already know that before buying it. UPDATE: completely stopped working after no more than 5 uses. Do NOT Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: A. Gnc

customer_reviews.title: OH Why did I not get this sooner?
customer_reviews.text: There is only one CON. I wish the Temp Control had more grip to make it easier to turn/twist. When it gets a bit greasy (from the food sizzling), the knob/control is difficult to adjust. PRO: everything else. During the warm season, I enjoy grilling or using the smoker. But, this season, I decided to try out the George Foreman indoor/outdoor grill. Figured I'd give it to a relative if I didn't like it all that well.. hehehe. This thing rocks. Cooks steaks in no time (at setting 4, or 5 if you like it a bit pink in the middle), and just about anything/everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Frustrated

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This grill was purchased to replace another electric grill that had seen better days. It does the job, heats up quickly, and is so easy to clean. I can remove the grill plate and clean it in my kitchen sink with a little soap and soft scrubby. That's what I love about it most. We use our grill 12 months out of the year on a covered porch. We have cooked beef, pork and chicken on it as well as a great vegetable combination of zucchini, peppers, mushrooms and onions. Delicious. Nothing falls through to the bottom and the taste is wonderful. I highly recommend this grill.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Hartman

customer_reviews.title: My go to grill
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy to use this grill and how little clean up it requires. I cook steaks, sausages, hot dogs, sandwiches and many other items that can be cooked on a flat grill. I'm on my 2nd George Foreman grill after years of use when the heating element stop working. I wasn't going to buy another, but it's so handy I couldn't do without it and couldn't fine another grill that could replace this one for me at the price point of this unit.
customer_reviews.author: S. vendange

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware - this grill is junk!
customer_reviews.text: This grill is a piece of JUNK! I only used it twice before the prong that plugs into the grill to turn it on broke. The grill came without the George Foreman logo on the lid. Who knows what brand of grill this really is?! In addition, now I have to figure out how to return the grill in the middle of a pandemic. I live in downtown Chicago and don’t have a car. Looks like I will be eating the $100. Awful! Bottom line - Stay far away from this cheaply made grill. Do yourself a favor and spend a little more money and get a better grill.
customer_reviews.author: Ames M

customer_reviews.title: Gteat
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for two reasons. 1. I had owned one of the small George Forman grills and used it for several years. I like the way it really grilled the meat. 2. I had always wanted a big one and our apartment complex alows the electric grills, so we can cook outside when it’s pretty and bring it inside when the weather makes outside grilling impossible. No smoke, smells great and has that good old grilled flavor
customer_reviews.author: granof12

customer_reviews.title: It's a Wonderful Grill
customer_reviews.text: It's no surprise this grill is so popular. It works perfectly. I discovered that I can also smoke my food as I grill it by adding a small open top aluminum foil container with wet wood chips (soak for at least 5 minutes) that I preheat when I start the grill. Now I have a really good substitute for a propane grill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: George Foreman GGR50B grill. I used it indoor only
customer_reviews.text: I did like this product I just was hoping it will last longer than 3 months, I have a large family and I used it for breakfast and diner, maybe it can not be used every day the power cable connector broke and the plastic in the end I think it melted. I will try my luck with the red one with the ceramic grill. I will comment later on this product.I got the replacement product, Thank you so much, now what do you want me to do with the one is defective? Waiting for instruction before it get discarded
customer_reviews.author: Alba glorsky

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright, but not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This could have been better made for the price I paid. It’s mostly cheap plastic, and if the grease misses the tray, it’s definitely going on the floor, and for some reason, I always have a lot of grease accumulated on the top of the grill. Also, I don’t understand why the cleaning tool isn’t automatically included with this product. It does do a good job of cooking my food quickly, and evenly, so it gets points for that, I just don’t think it should cost so much for being so cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: Good for burgers
customer_reviews.text: Just used it for the first time. I've had plenty of the regular Foreman grills and the burgers never tasted that good... they were great this time. I think it's because the grease did not drain as much because it doesn't have as much of a slope as the regular Foreman grills do. So, George had it all wrong, you do need a little grease for the burgers, but he got it right with this one. The temp control seems to work pretty well too. I'm happy... and now my house doesn't smell from grilling burgers! 👍
customer_reviews.author: k cull

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy a 3rd!
customer_reviews.text: we recently had ours stolen while we were parked at a store from the back of our truck. so this is our 2nd purchase of this exact grill. it was worth buying again because it's the type of grill I feel comfortable with. personally, flames make me nervous. this is the perfect in between for when I want to take over the grill. the draining ability, the reduction of fatty oils, & the easy to clean removable top is amazing. I'd buy a 3rd if it meant I had this grill in my life
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Finally we can grill!
customer_reviews.text: This electric grill is PERFECT for our covered condo balcony. I was skeptical at first and didn’t understand how this would be any different from the small George Foreman kitchen press we have — I’m so happy we decided to go for it. We used it tonight and everything turned out wonderfully (as you can see from the pictures. Haven’t done veggies yet - but we are really happy with this purchase. It was also surprisingly easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Duarte

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!! So worth the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough about this grill!!! I absolutely LOVE it. I use it every single day!! I live in Phoenix and it’s obviously very hot here... I set this up on my patio, I can cook an entire meal for me and my 3 boys without heating up my house!!!! I am blown away by the price.. it’s been a God send!!!
customer_reviews.author: oct2911

customer_reviews.title: George Foreman Grill Plates Aren’t Removable!! ☹️
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get my Pedestal George Foreman Grill! However; I read all of the reviews and it’s says this grill has removable dishwasherable grill plates??!! This proves not to be the case! I’m disappointed that this isn’t so!?? It is easy to wipe the grill plates off, but would be so much easier to remove the plates to clean further?? I buy a LOT from Amazon...my first place to go to purchase items! Thank you Diane Lary
customer_reviews.author: Diane L Lary

customer_reviews.title: Food taste nothing like an outdoor grill
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking grill easy to set up. Only purchased cause the apt I’m in doesn’t allowed outdoor open flame grills, electric only. It’s basically an iron skillet with a drip pan. Flavor of food is bland nothing like an actual outdoor grill complete waste of money would return if it wasn’t such a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Barton

customer_reviews.title: Great grill!
customer_reviews.text: We have a big Traeger grill that recently stopped working so I grabbed this on Amazon to use for outdoor grilling so I don't stink up my house. This little grill works great and is super easy to clean! Definitely recommend, and also recommend the matching cover for outdoor storage.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Kinda lame
customer_reviews.text: It assembles easily, and fires up right away. The grease drain well into the grease pan. But it's a real pain to clean. Also, nothing really fits well, everything is a quarter inch off. The grill doesn't sit right on the base, the lid doesn't sit right, it never feels as though everything is in place, but more that everything is slightly askew.
customer_reviews.author: Albert C. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for our apartment terrace
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas gift for my husband. He has been grilling everything. Don’t be fooled that just because it’s electric it won’t be like a real grill. This gives a nice char to grilled broccoli, steaks, burgers. Went together super easy, cools down very quickly, and is very easy to clean. We have a terrace on our apartment and it’s the perfect size, while still having a lot of room on the grill top. It is a bit top-heavy, so don’t leave it out on a windy day. Great price and we are so pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of how this thing cooks or the degree of cleanup afterwards.
customer_reviews.text: We just weren't very impressed with this grill. It's a great concept and would be a wonderful alternative when gas grills aren't allowed at an apartment. But as my wife put it, we have a skillet that was less expensive and can do the same thing with much less work. Cleaning this was also a big hassle compared to cleaning a pan.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Second GF outdoor grill I have bought. First lasted for years. Only missing here is the top vent on the cover. That was good for allowing heat to escape and smoke as necessary. Now, with this model, have to keep removing top periodically to get the same effect. Otherwise seems to be very similar in performance and easy to clean function.
customer_reviews.author: J E

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: We like this grill very much. We went solar a few years ago so when our gas grill died, electric was on the radar. We found this for under $100 - how can you beat the price for an indoor/outdoor grill? It cleans easily, even if we leave it overnight. Emptying the drip pan after each use is important - but easy. I've only used it indoors once on a rainy evening and steaks came out great without smoking up the house. We got the bigger one and have no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: A. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed! Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This grill didn’t even last a year. I got it at the end of last summer and used it twice. It was stores inside all winter with a cover. This summer I was excited to use it and after the 4th use all together it stopped heating up! Waste of money!!! Tried calling their support number but couldn’t get a live person. So annoyed and would love a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Lolascorpion

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad grill at this price!!
customer_reviews.text: It takes little time longer to heat up properly. Stand should be little heavier.
customer_reviews.author: MoH

customer_reviews.title: The Wobbly Grill
customer_reviews.text: There are two problems with this grill... first off, no matter what you do with the base, the entire grill wobbles. It really makes it seem cheap and poor quality. Second, whenever you need to take the food off the grill, you need to put the hot cover down somewhere. It would be a much better grill if the cover was attached so you could just lift it up without removing it. Honestly, I would not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Garry W

customer_reviews.title: This lid drips a lot onto the floor - maybe something I am doing wrong?
customer_reviews.text: I previously owned one of these purchased several years ago and loved it - lent it to family temporarily and they love it also. Decided I did really miss mine after all and purchased another. This one seems to drip onto floor around lid edge and not sure why, maybe my fault? The greasy drip is not easy if you have it on porous cement. Will keep trying to eliminate this problem but overall I do love this darn grill!
customer_reviews.author: H. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Drip pan is  too small
customer_reviews.text: I have a smaller grill from George Forman as well but wanted an outdoor because of the odor. It grills well, but the drip pan is too small, and it’s location, under the grill grate but inside of the bottom dome, makes it pretty much impossible to empty it during use. It overflowed when I used and dripped over the legs, making a big mess. Since it is a larger capacity grill it needs to have a larger drip pan, or located in a place where it can be easily emptied.
customer_reviews.author: Fabulous@59

customer_reviews.title: Grill top is poorly designed and you have to take it completely off to cook
customer_reviews.text: The grill top cover is very poorly designed. It should have been on a hinge. You have to take the entire top off and place it on table or somewhere else to continue cooking. The material quality and durability seem very good as the grill cooks well. Just wish they would have made the top attached to the unit to make cooking much easier.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: The grease tray is too small.
customer_reviews.text: I used the grill for one cookout. We cooked about 20 burgers, 12 hot dogs, and 10 chicken cutlets. The grease ran all down the leg of the unit and all over the ground. It took over a half hour to clean up the mess. We now know that this item cannot be used for what it was purchased for. Please advise
customer_reviews.author: Sharyn H.

customer_reviews.title: Heats up fast, grills perfectly and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: We have a one bedroom co-op with a terrace and have used this little mule of a grill every day during nice evenings (no rain). We’ve cooked steaks, all types of burgers, kabobs and fish. Love it! And it takes maybe 10 minutes to clean up like it’s never been used. One the Best Buy’s So far. Price is right too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Instructions say "Not meant to be stored outside."
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't explain what that means. Will rust? Will short circuit if the plug gets wet? A GRILL that isn't intended to be left outside? I will leave it outside and disconnect the plug with each use. I'll report back.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Questionable quality
customer_reviews.text: I had never bought George Foreman products. I used the grill about 6 times and it quit heating. I must say, it was still under warranty and they are requesting that I send 6" of cord, cut back.The pronged end actually has numbers of proof of purchase. I then will receive a new grill in 2 weeks. I grill a lot so am disappointed that it will take so long.Oh, and I must pay the $7.50 shipping for the new grill. I hope it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen P

customer_reviews.title: Great for Apartments
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have much room in my apartment. It doesn’t smoke much and I can put it under my fan hood and cook. I haven’t actually tried it outside because of this. I’m surprised most with how easy it is to clean. It takes a little effort, but by no means is it on a cast iron level. I recommend, unbeatable price and solves the grill issue with apartments.
customer_reviews.author: gtsweetepie

customer_reviews.title: For use in the house as well as outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I love these grills. You can fit many items on the grill. I keep it in an alcove in the kitchen all year around and grill indoors. I cook steaks, pork chops, pork tenderloin, chicken, you name it, on this grill. They don't take up much room and it cooks just as well as a gas grill.
customer_reviews.author: GinnyD.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have used the grill 3 times so far! I am very impressed with the Heating Unit! I cooked a 2 lbs Tri tip last night. the roast came out great! The clean up was easy! Took cool unit over to the sink and keeping the electric connection dry washed the front of the grill! Never was able to clean another grill! I have had 30 years of experience with electric Barbecues, this is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Sailor Joel

customer_reviews.title: George's are good...smokers are better!
customer_reviews.text: George's grills are great.... mostly for searing...you have to precook...then sear..needed it to be electric... buying an electric smoker, when I use the hickory pellets....the smoke still seeks out too much....the bottom of this grill is not sturdy enough and when locked it still comes off! I proped the handles to where the can't move further.
customer_reviews.author: An Allen

customer_reviews.title: Love it but wish I had gotten the slightly smaller one with different design
customer_reviews.text: Love it just wish I could have snagged the other version which isn't much smaller and has a different bottom. Didn't realize they were different design other than size and I dislike the bottom of this one. But it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Let's face it, it's not gas or charcoal, but it does the job
customer_reviews.text: I want allowed to have either gas or charcoal on my patio, which is wrong by itself, so I got this little puppy. Don't be fooled, it's not what you want it to be, but it's the best under the circumstances! So accept the fact for what it is and you'll love it :)
customer_reviews.author: S. Ilka

customer_reviews.title: Great little grill
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts but so far so good. I have been using it inside and outside and the meals have all been great. Tender and moist Cornish hens, moist not too well done salmon, roasted veggies, roasted snapper. So far nothing to complain about. And it is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works better than I thought it would
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how well this cooks meat! It looks like it came off of a gas or briquette grill with seared lines on the meat. It doesn't have the same smokey flavor from vaporized drippings, but pretty darn close. Also low amp draw so no trouble with the outlet overloading.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Plug Shorted Out: Grill won't turn on
customer_reviews.text: I had it for over three years but only used it a handful of times, it worked fine until the plug made a spark when turning it on and the grill is dead now. Won't turn on. Now I have a bunch of steaks I can't grill. Plans cancelled and $100 wasted on a grill.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Wiese

customer_reviews.title: So simple it's almost stupid!
customer_reviews.text: I love to cook meat before work for my lunches. This BBQ has made life so simple! Heats up quickly, easy to adjust temps. Super easy to clean and fits right on my patio out of the way! We have other BBQ's on the patio, but those require a lot to use quickly - this one works great in a hurry, and even at that - cooks the meat evenly and perfect!
customer_reviews.author: D'Anna Watson

customer_reviews.title: Does not evenly heat!  Very bulky too!
customer_reviews.text: Grill heating is way off. Does not heat evenly and no options to adjust the temperature accordingly. Very bulky and produces too much smoke for indoors! Very poor value to be so expensive. Should have returned it! No more George Foreman grills for this Family! Thought I'd give them a try again after 10 years and still not impressed! :-(
customer_reviews.author: Family

customer_reviews.title: Bought an earlier model
customer_reviews.text: Used a later model with a ceramic grill at a vacation location. Absolutely loved it. Started to buy the same model, but decided to buy this model because the grill could be removed and cleaned (the ceramic top, while very nonstick, was fixed to the unit). Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. ONeal

customer_reviews.title: Very delicious meats when cover is left on
customer_reviews.text: EXTREMELY juicy turkey and beef from this thing. I didn't expect it to go as well as it did, to be honest. I have a regular foreman grill and it's nice, but this thing blows the result away. The cord is a little short if you have a decent sized deck, so I'd recommend getting an extension cord just in case. There's nowhere to set anything. Not the top, not the spatula, nothing. So you'll have to have a table nearby.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Whispers

customer_reviews.title: Love this grill
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this grill. Does drip moisture onto floor and heat is better closer to the power cord. But I love this thing. And super duper easy to clean. You can literally clean it with your finger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact and convenient but not as hot as desired
customer_reviews.text: This grill does not get very hot, but does get hot enough to cook burgers. It is compact and perfect for tiny places but we do wish it could get hotter.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cooking Anything Without Gadgets
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It heats quick and is easy to assemble. The design lets you work with anything. Veggies, fish, burgers, whatever. It also holds a LOT of food. My only complaint is that the plate only has a grease drain on one side. It needs another or a slant to get it to drain more efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: mobius_spider

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment complex, and we can’t have flame grills on my patio so I figured I’d give this a chance. I’m really really impressed. I preheated it for 20 minutes with the lid on at 5. 3 minutes on each side of the steak and I came out medium done. Not dry. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Paigelaurelxo

customer_reviews.title: Love our George Forman !!
customer_reviews.text: We Love It! We used this on the 4th of July and couldn’t believe how easy it was and how convenient it is. We used it inside . It was nice to grill hamburgers and hotdogs and NOT have a bunch of smoke going everywhere. It was Really easy to clean .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases ever made!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. Grills steaks, hotdogs, burgers. Inside or outside. Such a breeze to clean. No flare ups and no babysitting. I use Liquid Smoke in my marinades and WOW what BBQ flavor you get. Recommend to anyone. Also purchased the Foreman grill cover and silicone utensils to keep it looking great for a long time. My husband was grill king, now I have taken over!
customer_reviews.author: Elkhunters

customer_reviews.title: Super great. Buy it, you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. I live in an apartment that doesn’t allow regular grills on the wooden deck. After a ton of research I settled on this electric grill and I’m so happy I did. I can grill inside if it’s raining, outside if it’s nice, and the food comes out great! I’m so happy I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy B.

customer_reviews.title: Great grill for our balcony
customer_reviews.text: We were trying to find the perfect solution for our condo balcony. We've been SO pleasantly surprised by this grill. It holds/cooks a lot of food at once. We had steaks & lobster on AND a few ears of corn all at the same time. We highly recommend this powerful little grill. OH - and the cleanup is the best part. Super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: T Smith

customer_reviews.title: Size is great. Easy to clean. Works good as a dinner table top grill.
customer_reviews.text: I found a better use for this grill than as a standing type, at least for my purposes. I found that it works great as a Korean dinner table top grill. I was having trouble finding a Korean bbq grill for indoors, until I got this. As long as you have good ventilation, the grill works great for a family dinner.
customer_reviews.author: JKN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for apartment
customer_reviews.text: We recently moved from a house, with a gas grill, into an apartment, that doesn't allow gas grills, and needed something to grill on. We ordered the George Forman and we love it! Just plug it in and let it heat up for about 5 minutes and it's ready to cook. We do fish, chicken, burgers and even vegetables and it does a great job. Bonus, we don't have to heat up the kitchen! for $70.00 you can't beat it. We're so glad we got it!
customer_reviews.author: OG mom

customer_reviews.title: Grill works well.  Wish it had the ability to use smoke chips
customer_reviews.text: This is nice for older people who don’t want to fool with propane or charcoal. I wish it had some kind of cookbook on how to use it and what to cook. This model also does not have any kind of temperature reading on the top so it makes it hard to control the temperature inside the dome.
customer_reviews.author: Bette Wood

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The second time we used it, the control knob heated up to untouchable, burned up the heating element, and now doesn't work at all. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Hinson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic. Could not be happier. Gambled 100 bucks. Turned to be no gsmble
customer_reviews.text: My out door grill is covered for the winter. this foreman is easy to store and clean with nice cover and takes up no room in the garage. Cover is great eith gipper st top for removal and to hang by. The grill is easy to clean and keep clean. The groved sponge mskes cleaning even easier. I csn clean the grill, cover, and grease catcher in 10 min. Looks like new when finnished. I like to wipe down the grilling surfsce with cooking oil each tine before heating it up.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great little electric grill!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a condo and this one one of the furnishings left. We LOVE it- so much that we bought another for another condo. Small and portable. Has held up well to sea and salt water air. I did buy the cover for our second new one, though. It is perfect for fish, chicken, hamburgers, steaks. So easy to heat up. Clean up is fairly easy. Spray with a cooking spray if you can. You want to go easy with scrubbing the grill. If the coating comes off replacement grills are more than replacing the whole thing, but I will when I need to. We considered the much pricier Weber, but why when this is perfect?!
customer_reviews.author: Warren S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: In my apartment I’m not allowed to have a charcoal grill. This can easily fit on my small patio and gets the job done just like a regular grill. Very easy to use and move in and out of the apartment. It’s not difficult to clean, but it doesn’t exactly fit in the sink, it’s kind of awkward but manageable.
customer_reviews.author: CaitB

customer_reviews.title: Can’t believe it’s electric
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say enough, can’t believe it’s electric?! Six large bone in pork chops, 10 min a side, one of the best I have had. 8 filet mignons, 5 min per side! Has a great cover/dome, can’t say enough. Clean with damp towel and empty grease trey!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Apparently I am one of the dissatisfied consumers.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well twice before it flat lined. Too bulky and expensive to return.
customer_reviews.author: Since1995

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Love this grill! Got it for my 2nd floor apartment balcony as open flame grill was not permitted. It grills a LOT better than I expected. Wish it were a tad easier to clean, I’ve found you have to go in at a sweet-spot time when it’s still warm and can easily be scraped, but not too hot, and not cool and hardened on the surface. Definitely recommend when a traditional grill is not an option!
customer_reviews.author: H2

customer_reviews.title: Great electric grill
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this as we aren’t allowed to have a gas grill where we live & the size of our patio is small. Great for small spaces & cooks like a grill. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a small electric grill. The only hiccup we had was the shipping it got sent to the wrong warehouse & then it happened again. We should have had it in 2 days but took a week.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the way it grilled our chicken and vegetables- veggies came out soggy and tasted horrible (I have made them on charcoal grills for 15 years and they are wonderful and crisp) and chicken was almost “wet”, not the grilling experience I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: angela

product_meta.title: George Foreman 15-Serving Indoor/Outdoor Electric Grill, Silver, GGR50B
product_meta.description:
Color:Silver| Pattern Name:Electric GrillThis is how real fast food is made. The George Foreman 4-Serving Removable Plate Grill and Panini heats up 35% faster* to deliver hot, tasty food that’s made your way. Cleanup is just as fast thanks to the dishwasher-safe removable plates. They come with the George Tough nonstick coating that holds up through cooking and cleaning, alike. This is the must-have grill for couples or small families who want easy, delicious meals. *compared to current removable plate grill, GRP0004 **from 1/4lb. uncooked 80/20 ground chuck ***compared to standard George Tough™ non-stick coating

AMAZON.COM
Grilling really can't get much easier than this. After assembling the grill (which takes only a few minutes), simply plug it in and allow about 10 minutes to fully preheat the surface while you gather your steaks, kebabs, or whatever's to be grilled. The electric heat has an adjustable range from low (for keeping food warm) to high (for searing steaks). The nonstick grill surface not only means you can use a minimum of added fat, but it also makes cleanup a cinch. The surface has a subtle slope, with channels that draw accumulated fat or other liquids into a tray just below the surface. The high domed and vented lid helps create a circular flow of hot air to ensure even cooking--particularly important for a large roast or whole chicken.

 The grill can be placed either directly on a tabletop or atop its pedestal. On its own, the grill surface stands about 6 inches high; with the pedestal, it stands about 2-1/2 feet high, not counting the domed lid. The pedestal is plenty sturdy for cooking, but the grill still seems a bit top-heavy, so pay special attention if grilling in a high-traffic area or near kids. Because of the easy electric heat, this grill can be used outdoors or indoors--when using it indoors, though, be prepared for potential spattering, steam, or other side effects of cooking. --Cynthia Nims
feature_bullets: Included components: Use And Care Manuals

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars6,795 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
